name: christmasWonderland
description:
A Christmas Extravaganza

Can you help Santa Claus find all the toys scattered through Wonderland.

Christmas Wonderland is a hidden object game featuring superbly detailed screens with lots of inter-level games and puzzles.
Santa and his team are working non- stop to get everything ready - but time is running out. Travel around a Wonderland crammed full of objects, with beautiful graphics and mini puzzles for all the family to enjoy. Can you help Santa find all the toys scattered around Wonderland and deliver the presents in time for Christmas.
Each time the game is played, the objects change and this further increases the long term enjoyment of the game, which makes it a game not to be missed.

Christmas Wonderland is a hidden object game featuring superb main screens with lots of inter-level games and puzzles. The Twelve Days of Christmas song is playing quietly, then BANG ñ everything is scattered all over Wonderland. The game begins in Santaís office where he is busy working out his plans. Next, he goes to his Reindeer stables, his Workshop at the North Pole as well as a Toy store in the middle of town. Then itís Christmas Eve and Santa flies over the rooftops to deliver his presents around the World. Santa arrives at Michael and Emmaís place. Itís an amazing mansion in the district known as Hollyoak Heights. After parking his Sleigh and Reindeer on the grass, he goes up on the roof then down the chimney. From the fireplace he goes into the living room to drop off his presents, The children come down in the morning and open their presents. Then itís time for lunch in the Dining room where there is a fantastic holiday meal on the table. In the afternoon the family go to see if there has been anything happening in Hollyoak church. It is magnificently decorated both inside and out. The game ends with a jigsaw puzzle of the Nativity Manger. Christmas Wonderland will give hours and hours of gameplay for players of all ages and abilities. Each time the game is played, the objects you need to find changes and this further increases the long term enjoyment of the game, which is one not to be missed.
